law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Dwelling" means a structure any part of which has been adapted for overnight accommodation of an individual, regardless of whether an individual is actually present.
"Dwelling" includes a kitchen, shop, barn, stable, or outbuilding that is a parcel to, belongs to, or adjoins the dwelling.

text.section: "Maliciously" means acting with intent to harm a person or property.

section.section: "Structure" means a building or other construction, a vehicle, or watercraft.

"Structure" includes a:
barn, stable, pier, wharf, and any facility attached to a pier or wharf;
tent, public building, or public bridge; and
railroad car.

text.section: "Willfully" means acting intentionally, knowingly, and purposely.
